snippet.title: Unrivaled Heroes - Nusantara Beat em' up Brawler - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy on Playstore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.GingerSunGames.UnrivaledHeroesPremium

Prepare your 2.5 D beat em’ up side scroller battle for a challenging adventure in medieval Indonesia aesthetic folklore, where players can learn ancient martial art skills in a progression chapter story to experience the true adrenaline rush from mythical heroes!

[Game Features]

☆ Amazing Beat 'em up Brawler!
- Intense and strategic combat. Learn enemies behavior and find the chance to strike!
- More playable characters with totally different playstyles
- Fluid Control System! No autoplay! You have full control of everything
- 3 Levels of Difficulty! Beat harder difficulty for even more rewards

☆ Folklore story-driven beat’em up
- Immerse in a branching adventure in Indonesia medieval aesthetic folklore.

☆ Freedom of character build
- Classic Attribute Distribution (STR / AGI / INT / VIT) to match your desirable playstyle
- Upgrade your items from shop that lets you choose your preferred build

☆ Unique Skills and Perks
- Each character has heroic perks (innate abilities) to differentiate playstyle
- Complete each chapter to unlock all 4 Skills.

☆ Weapon-Based Martial Art Combat
- Merciless fight with hordes of enemies using ancient martial art skill and magically powered weapon.

☆ Variety of Costumes to Collect
- Buy Costumes for your beloved character to change his/her appearance, and get a decent boost of power.

☆ The cartoon, charming and colourful visual
- With a blend of 2D character in 3D environment with colourful animated graphic that make the game look alive.

☆ Other Great Features
- Simple yet beautiful stylized cartoon graphics
- Lightweight optimized performance. Can be played in middle devices
- Doesn't consume much power. Totally battery-friendly
- Offline. You can play anywhere without internet connection
- No need to pay or watch Ads, unless you want to support us!
